item.title: NovaScript Editor
item.description: This is the main and only way (currently) to edit and run the programming language

item.title: NovaScript Lang
item.description:
the language is nearly exactly the same as python
is it extended able with extensions which are written in this format
{ "info": { "id": "math", "name": "Math Utilities", "version": "1.1", "author": "NovaScript Team", "description": "Provides basic math and random number generation functions for NovaScript." }, "functions": [ { "name": "random", "inputs": ["min", "max"], "javascript": "return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min;", "returns": "integer" }, { "name": "pow", "inputs": ["base", "exponent"], "javascript": "return Math.pow(base, exponent);", "returns": "number" }, { "name": "abs", "inputs": ["num"], "javascript": "return Math.abs(num);", "returns": "number" } ] }
